name: The Day of the Pharaoh
description:
The Day of the Pharaoh

Here we are ... I made the beta version of my project. It is a top-down and 2D adventure. The game is completely FREE! The online version is still in Beta and you may encounter some errors ... For this I apologize in advance and invite you to participate in the development of this project. Please, make a comment with your opinion, indicate strengths and weaknesses and suggest improvements. I wait for you!

The Game

Go through the corridors of intricate labyrinths, reach the exit before the time runs out. Solve complicated puzzles, avoid traps, find the fragments of an ancient sacred tablet. It won't be that simple, the guards will chase you to make your search impossible, deadly spiders will go in search of prey, not to mention the Pharaoh's Mummy. Don't wake her up, she will have no mercy on you

It sounds simple

You will find guards, traps, dangerous statues and deathtouch mummies that will make your life very complicated. I forgot ... for each level you have a limited time!
